Robot

Class Navigator

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • Robot.Navigator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    public class Navigator
extends Thread
    This class accomplishes the task of Navigation, that is, it is responsible for sending commands to the motors to go to a coordinate. In addition to movement, this class can also rotate the robot to a certain heading using an Odometer. The methods in this class are all private and non static. The variables used in this navigator are private but this class uses a few public variables from the main method.
    Author:
    Thomas

      This stores the possible states that Navigator can exist in.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private ObstacleAvoidance avoidance
      The ObstacleAvoidance object that gets created when we detect a wall.
      private int bandCenter
      Distance to keep away from a wall when the robot encounter an obstacle (in cm).
      private int bandWidth
      Allowable deviation from the bandCenter that the ultrasonic sensor reading can be before it 1) goes closer or 2) goes further from the wall (in cm).
      private double[] destDistance
      The array that stores the x and y coordinates for the destination (in cm).
      private double destTheta
      The heading the robot will need to head, if it wants to go straight and arrive at the destination (in radians).
      private double destThreshold
      The allowable threshold for coordinates (x and y) to be within this value of the optimal value (in cm).
      private int forwardSpeed
      The angular velocity the wheels will go forward at (in deg/sec).
      private EV3LargeRegulatedMotor headMotor
      The EV3LargeRegulatedMotor object for the motor that rotates the ultrasonic sensor.
      private boolean isCorrecting
      Flag to state whether or not the robot is moving towards a coordinate.

      Flag to state whether or not the robot is navigating to a coordinate.

      The EV3LargeRegulatedMotor object for the left motor.
      private int motorHigh
      Stores the high motor speed (in deg/s).

      Stores the low motor speed (in deg/s).
      private double[] nowDistance
      An array that stores the current x, y, and heading values of the robot as passed from odometer.

      Stores the current heading (in radians).
      private double nowX
      Stores the current x coordinate (in cm).
      private double nowY
      Stores the current y coordinate (in cm).
      private Odometer odometer
      The Odometer object that we use to access x, y, and theta values.

      The EV3LargeRegulatedMotor object for the right motor.
      private double thetaThreshold
      The allowable threshold for angles to be within this value of the optimal value (in radians).

      Buffer array to store data from the ultrasonic sensor (in m).

      Stores the most recent distance reading from the ultrasonic sensor (in cm).

      Stores the Port object that the ultrasonic sensor will be plugged into.

      Buffer sampleProvider that can fetch samples from the ultrasonic sensor.
      SensorModes usSensor
      Buffer sensorMode, stores what type of sensor is being used at a certain port.

    • Field Detail

      • forwardSpeed

        private int forwardSpeed
        The angular velocity the wheels will go forward at (in deg/sec).

      • destDistance

        private double[] destDistance
        The array that stores the x and y coordinates for the destination (in cm). destDistance[0] will store x, destDistance[1] will store y.

      • destTheta

        private double destTheta
        The heading the robot will need to head, if it wants to go straight and arrive at the destination (in radians).

      • nowDistance

        private double[] nowDistance
        An array that stores the current x, y, and heading values of the robot as passed from odometer.

      • nowX

        private double nowX
        Stores the current x coordinate (in cm).

      • nowY

        private double nowY
        Stores the current y coordinate (in cm).

      • nowTheta

        private double nowTheta
        Stores the current heading (in radians).

      • thetaThreshold

        private final double thetaThreshold
        The allowable threshold for angles to be within this value of the optimal value (in radians). It is a final (constant) variable.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • destThreshold

        private final double destThreshold
        The allowable threshold for coordinates (x and y) to be within this value of the optimal value (in cm). It is a final (constant) variable.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • isNavigating

        private boolean isNavigating
        Flag to state whether or not the robot is navigating to a coordinate.

        True if it is in the process of navigating (turning, moving, obstacle avoiding). False if 1) it has no coordinate to navigate to or 2) arrived at the destination.

      • isCorrecting

        private boolean isCorrecting
        Flag to state whether or not the robot is moving towards a coordinate.

        True if it is in the process of moving. False if it is not moving.

      • leftMotor

        private EV3LargeRegulatedMotor leftMotor
        The EV3LargeRegulatedMotor object for the left motor. This is set in Main.

      • rightMotor

        private EV3LargeRegulatedMotor rightMotor
        The EV3LargeRegulatedMotor object for the right motor. This is set in Main.

      • headMotor

        private EV3LargeRegulatedMotor headMotor
        The EV3LargeRegulatedMotor object for the motor that rotates the ultrasonic sensor. This is set in Main.

      • odometer

        private Odometer odometer
        The Odometer object that we use to access x, y, and theta values.

      • avoidance

        private ObstacleAvoidance avoidance
        The ObstacleAvoidance object that gets created when we detect a wall. This is set in Main.

      • usData

        public float[] usData
        Buffer array to store data from the ultrasonic sensor (in m).

      • usDistance

        public double usDistance
        Stores the most recent distance reading from the ultrasonic sensor (in cm).

        Buffer sampleProvider that can fetch samples from the ultrasonic sensor.

        public SensorModes usSensor
        Buffer sensorMode, stores what type of sensor is being used at a certain port.

      • bandCenter

        private final int bandCenter
        Distance to keep away from a wall when the robot encounter an obstacle (in cm). This is set in Main. This is a final (constant) variable.

      • bandWidth

        private final int bandWidth
        Allowable deviation from the bandCenter that the ultrasonic sensor reading can be before it 1) goes closer or 2) goes further from the wall (in cm). This is set in Main. This is a final (constant) variable.

      • motorLow

        private final int motorLow
        Stores the low motor speed (in deg/s). This is set in Main. This is a final (constant) variable.

      • motorHigh

        private final int motorHigh
        Stores the high motor speed (in deg/s). This is set in Main. This is a final (constant) variable.

      • usPort

        private static final Port usPort
        Stores the Port object that the ultrasonic sensor will be plugged into. This is a final (constant) variable.

      • checkEmergency

        private boolean checkEmergency()
        Method that checks if usDistance is <= 20. If so, we will say that there is an obstacle.
        Returns:
        True if we see an obstacle.

        False if we do not see an obstacle.

      • updateTravel

        private void updateTravel()
        Updates the destTheta to a more current one.

      • facingDest

        private boolean facingDest(double destTheta)
        Checks if we are facing in the heading towards the destination within a threshold.
        Parameters:
        destTheta - The heading we need to face so that we are headed towards the destination
        Returns:
        True if we are facing in the desired heading.

        False if we are not facing in the desired heading.

      • checkIfDone

        private boolean checkIfDone(double[] nowDistance)
        Checks if we are at the destination within a threshold in both x and y.
        Parameters:
        nowDistance - The array that stores the x and y coordinates of the destination.
        Returns:
        True if we are at the destination.

        False if we are not at the destination

      • setSpeeds

        private void setSpeeds(int leftSpeed,
             int rightSpeed)
        Simply sets left and right motors to a certain speed (in deg/s).
        Parameters:
        leftSpeed - Left motor speed
        rightSpeed - Right motor speed

      • travelTo

        public void travelTo(double destX,
            double destY)
        Public method that is called outside of navigator to give navigator the command to move to a certain coordinate.

        Stores the destination x and y coordinates inside destDistance[]. Calls getDestAngle to calculate the desired heading. Raises the isNavigating flag.
        Parameters:
        destX -
        destY -

      • getDestAngle

        private double getDestAngle()
        Uses the destination x and y coordinates and the current x and y coordinates to calculate the desired heading (destTheta)
        Returns:
        A desired heading (in radians).

      • turnTo

        public void turnTo(double destTheta)
        Sends command to left and right motors to turn a certain about of degrees so that the robot will turn to a desired heading. The turn itself will be a minimal turn ie. A turn CW/CCW of >180 degrees will be a turn CCW/CW of (360 - the desired >180 degrees). All angles in this method are in radians.

        Relies on WHEEL_RADIUS and TRACK to calculate each motor's rotation (in radians).
        Parameters:
        destTheta - The desired heading that you want to robot to turn to.

      • isNavigating

        public boolean isNavigating()
        A public getter for isNavigating
        Returns:
        isNavigating

      • isCorrecting

        public boolean isCorrecting()
        A public getter for isCorrecting
        Returns:
        isCorrecting

      • convertDistance

        private static int convertDistance(double radius,
                  double distance)
        Converts linear distance that you want a wheel to rotate into a value that stores the rotations (in degrees) that the wheel needs to rotate.
        Parameters:
        radius - The radius of the wheel.
        distance - The distance you want a wheel to rotate.
        Returns:
        An int that stores the rotation (in degrees) that a wheel needs to rotate.

      • convertAngle

        private static int convertAngle(double radius,
               double width,
               double angle)
        Converts a desired change in robot's heading (in radians) into how much linear distance a wheel needs to travel (in cm).
        Parameters:
        radius - The radius of the wheel (in cm).
        width - The track or width of the robot (in cm).
        angle - The angle you want the robot to turn (in radians).
        Returns:
        The linear distance that a wheel would have to rotate.

        public void setNavigating(boolean isNavigating)
        A public setter for isNavigating
        Parameters:
        isNavigating - Flag that tells if the robot is navigating or not.
